EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Building “Bootful” UIs with Spring Boot and Vaadin 10AM.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Building “Bootful” UIs with Spring Boot and Vaadin
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Building “Bootful” UIs with Spring Boot and Vaadin. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details: Date: Thursday, October 23, 2014
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=299599658>
<https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=299599658> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 299 599 658
Thank you,
